summary: This document is a compilation of news article links and headlines from October 28, 2020, related to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). It covers multiple stories, including the unsealing of charges against Ghislaine Maxwell, a guilty plea from David Correia, and various other political and legal news.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of news regarding the unsealing of charges related to the alleged kidnapping of minors.

persons.name: David Correia
persons.context: Set to plead guilty in a case, as reported by NBC and the New York Times.

persons.name: Rudy Giuliani
persons.context: Mentioned in a New York Times article link in the context of David Correia's guilty plea.

persons.name: Hunter Biden
persons.context: Subject of allegations mentioned in a Yahoo Sports article link.

persons.name: Steve Bannon
persons.context: Mentioned in a LAW360 article link regarding a border wall fundraising scheme.

connections.description: Both are subjects of separate SDNY legal proceedings reported on the same day.

events.title: Charges Unsealed Against Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: News reports indicate charges related to the alleged kidnapping of minors were unsealed against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: David Correia Guilty Plea
events.description: David Correia is set to plead guilty in a case, as reported by multiple news outlets.

keyFacts: The document is a news clip summary from October 28, 2020, compiled by the SDNY.
Charges were unsealed against Ghislaine Maxwell related to the alleged kidnapping of minors.
David Correia was set to plead guilty in a separate case on the same day.
The compilation includes links to various news outlets covering these and other political/legal stories.
The document shows the public news coverage surrounding key figures in the Epstein/Maxwell case at that time.
